Package org.jtrim2.taskgraph

Class TaskNodeCreateArgs<R,I>

java.lang.Object
org.jtrim2.taskgraph.TaskNodeCreateArgs<R,I>
Type Parameters:
R - the return type of the task node to be created
I - the type of the argument passed to the task node factory when requested for a node to be created
public final class TaskNodeCreateArgs<R,I> extends Object
Defines the properties used to create a task node. Instances of this class are passed to task node factories.

Thread safety

Although methods of this class are safely accessible from multiple threads concurrently, the returned properties are not.

Synchronization transparency

The methods of this class are synchronization transparent.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskNodeCreateArgs

      public TaskNodeCreateArgs(TaskNodeKey<R,I> nodeKey, TaskNodeProperties defaults, TaskInputBinder inputs)
      Creates a new TaskNodeCreateArgs with the given properties.
      Parameters:
      nodeKey - the TaskNodeKey identifying the node to be created. This argument cannot be null.
      defaults - the default values for the node properties. This argument cannot be null.
      inputs - the TaskInputBinder used to bind inputs for the created task node function. This argument cannot be null.

  • Method Details

    • nodeKey

      public TaskNodeKey<R,I> nodeKey()
      Returns the key uniquely identifying the task node to be created.
      Returns:
      the key uniquely identifying the task node to be created. This method never returns null.

    • factoryArg

      public I factoryArg()
      Returns the argument passed to the task node factory. This argument with the task node factory key uniquely identify a task node.
      Returns:
      the argument passed to the task node factory. This method may return null, if null was specified for the factory.

    • inputs

      public TaskInputBinder inputs()
      Returns the TaskInputBinder used to bind inputs for the created task node function.
      Returns:
      the TaskInputBinder used to bind inputs for the created task node function. This method never returns null.

    • properties

      Returns the properties to be set for the associated task node to be created.
      Returns:
